/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of red and white, stand out against the clear blue sky. The trees, with their lush green foliage, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in many cities. The image is captured from the left side of the street, offering a glimpse into the daily life in this part of Beijing.
